#STM32F10x_Software - STM32F 

= Introduction =

ST STM32F sample software ported to GCC. The orignal code can be downloaded from ST support page here:

[http://www.st.com/mcu/familiesdocs-110.html Documents and files for family STM32 ]

[Supported_STM32F10x_MCUs  Support for 62 STM32F10x MCUs]


= Status =
2010.02.01  ver 1.00    Prelimnary version, first Release [http://code.google.com/p/32bitmicro/source/browse/#svn/trunk/src/st SVN trunk]
